entry.title: [RBX7][DedicatedServers] - R710A01
entry.content:
Jun 30, 05:54 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 30/06/2023 04:35 UTC
End Time : 30/06/2023 05:52 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Jun 30, 04:45 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 30, 04:41 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 30/06/2023 04:35 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the rack R710A01 are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
